wishramika jenaralge pawadime prakashayen pasu:wishramika jenaral sarath fonseka mahatha ‘yuda aparadha’ sambandhayen karana lada prakashayath samangama shri lankawata erehi wides kumanthranakaruwo nawatha kriyathmaka wemin sitithi.kalayaka sita ma shri lankawata ha aarakshaka hamudawanta erehiwa dwesha sahagatha pracharayan gena giya el.ti.ti.ee. gathi wideshiya web adawi ha wenath wideshiya puwath sewa mangin dan rujuwa prashna kirimata patan gena thibenne shri lankawe ‘yuda aparadha’ sambandhayen eksath jathin ge sanwidhanaya wahama piyawara gatha yuthu bawayi.shri lankawe aarakshaka hamudawan wisin nirayuda demala tharunayan ghathanaya karanu labana bawa kiyamin wyaja widiyo patayak engalanthaye chanal 4 nalikawa osse wikashaya kerunu athara ee samangama shri lankawata erehiwa yuda aparadha chodana gonu kala yuthu bawata da handa nangina.eheth eya wyaja widiyo patayak baw shri lanka baladharin wisin oppu karana ladi.

“samasthayak lesa sarwa aarthika kriyakarithwaya mishra thaththwayaka pawathuni. 2016 aga bhagaye sita pawathina niyangaya saha me wasara muladi athi wu ganwathura thaththwaya hethuwen wardhanaya mandagami wima saha uddhamanathmaka pidana wardhanaya wima siduwiya. 2017 wasara sandaha aarthika wardhanaya siyayata 4.5 mattamata wada adu wanu athi athara, idiri wasaredi krushikarmika nishpadanaya yatha thaththwayata pathwima saha yatithala pahasukam wyapruthi wegawath wima hethuwen idiri wasaredi wardhanaya nawathath yatha thaththwayata pathwanu athayi purokathanaya kara atha.
pasugiya wasara deka thula da sidu kala paridi mathuwa athi naya arbudaya thula wuwada, 2018 warshaya sandaha sidukirimata niyamitha rajya aayojanayan apa adu kale naha.
